duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze data and business intelligence challenges, needs, and opportunities to inform business decisions.
Engage with business stakeholders to understand client requirements and translate them to technical solutions.
Prepare wireframes and test with clients to develop functional and technical specification designs.
Assist with analysis, documentation, and implementation of solutions.
Focus on continuous improvements to team and processes to achieve highest efficiency and create maximum value.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Management, Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Business Information Systems or related field (Master's preferred)
